channel.title: Comments on: Chocolate Chip Hot Cross Bun (Bread) and Butter Pudding

item.title: By: April @ My Food Trail
item.dc:creator: April @ My Food Trail
item.description:
What a clever idea for using up leftover hot cross buns, though I'm not sure how you would end up with 9 leftover, especially if their homemade! :)
Hope your cake making class went well! It was in March right?
item.content:encoded:
What a clever idea for using up leftover hot cross buns, though I’m not sure how you would end up with 9 leftover, especially if their homemade! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: What a decadent idea for using up your leftovers!!! This is divine. Now I wish I had some left over!
item.content:encoded: What a decadent idea for using up your leftovers!!! This is divine. Now I wish I had some left over!

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: I think we had like two leftover boxed of hot cross buns at work. Now I wish I had taken some home to make this lovely dessert!
item.content:encoded: I think we had like two leftover boxed of hot cross buns at work. Now I wish I had taken some home to make this lovely dessert!

item.description: Buns look very yumm, love the chocolate chips in them!
item.content:encoded: Buns look very yumm, love the chocolate chips in them!

item.description: This sounds delicious, especially with the chocolate chips! Happy Easter!
